channel.title: Comments on: When Regular Expressions Get Greedy

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2009/05/04/when-regular-expressions-gets-greedy/#comment-2962">Beau Lebens</a>.
True, but that wouldn't have illustrated what happens when you get hit by greedy regular expressions :-)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Beau Lebens.

True, but that wouldn’t have illustrated what happens when you get hit by greedy regular expressions ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Beau Lebens
item.dc:creator: Beau Lebens
item.content:encoded:
You could also have just used a more restrictive character range/class in your regex to avoid this.

something like:

‘|anamehere+([^@]+)@.*$|

or

‘|anamehere+([a-zA-Z0-9-]*)@.*$|

ðŸ™‚
